apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this couple with a heart emoji showcases a woman with a medium skin tone and another with a medium-dark skin tone, united by a bright, glossy heart. Apple's 3D design gives the heart a tactile, almost luminous quality, emphasizing the warmth and affection in their relationship. The soft rounded edges and realistic lighting on the figures convey a genuine sense of connection and love, representing partnership and mutual affection.
